Articles.Content:
As requested by Rocketeer Hopeful, BluPlanet Inc. has created a Duna lander. Simple, with 39 parts, a sr. docking port, and parachute landing.

Tested for 75-80k orbit landing and return. Note this is only a lander, designed specifically for motherships with sr. ports. It is meant to be deployed from orbit and return to dock.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/hfeakhfrn9ij0ua/Duna%20Excursion.craft
